fields.name: extractionMethod.platform_family
fields.label: Platform Family
fields.help: The family of instrument used for sequencing.

fields.name: extractionMethod.platform_model
fields.label: Platform Model
fields.help: The instrument model used for sequencing.

fields.name: extractionMethod.base_calls
fields.label: Base calls
fields.help: Specify the Base encoding for the sequencing. Eg. Base Color in Illumina, Color space in SOLiD.

fields.name: extractionMethod.avg_sequencing_depth
fields.label: Avg. sequencing depth (Million of Spots)
fields.help: Approximate  number of Spots in Millions. In Paired end, each spot has 2 reads.

fields.name: extractionMethod.slide_id
fields.label: Slide ID
fields.help: The plate name (454) / slide name (SOLiD) / flowcell name (Illumina and Helicos) used for sequencing.

fields.name: extractionMethod.lane_number
fields.label: Lane number
fields.help: Higher level partition of run data to which this data block pertains. Eg. Lane Number in Illumina, Slide in SOLiD, Channel in Helicos

fields.name: extractionMethod.avg_sequence_length
fields.label: Avg. sequence length (bp)
fields.help: The fixed number of bases expected in each raw sequence, including both mate pairs and any technical reads.

fields.name: extractionMethod.pooling_strategy
fields.label: Pooling stategy
fields.help: Indicates how the library or libraries are organized if multiple samples are involved..

fields.name: extractionMethod.library_construction_protocol
fields.label: Library construction protocol
fields.help: Free text describing the protocol by which the sequencing library was constructed.

fields.name: extractionMethod.layout
fields.label: Library layout
fields.help: Specify whether to expect single, paired, or other configuration of reads. In the case of paired reads, information about the relative distance and orientation should be specified.

fields.name: extractionMethod.orientation
fields.label: Paired-end orientation
fields.help: Relative orientation of the paired reads. When the relative orientation is in the same direction to a reference sequence 5′-3′-5′-3′ (forward-forward), when is in the opposite direction 5′-3′-3′-5′ (forward-reverse).

fields.name: extractionMethod.nominal_length
fields.label: Nominal length (bp)
fields.help: Average distance between the paired reads in base pair.

fields.name: extractionMethod.nominal_length_stdev
fields.label: Nominal length Std dev (bp)
fields.help: Standard deviation for the average distance between the paired reads.
